text_block_list.text:
― During the summer training camp held at the 
seaside training facility, the horsegirls engage 
in even more rigorous training than usual.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha… ha…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The sensation here is completely different 
from our usual course. However, I can feel 
that being trained here is hardly a bad thing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now, let's keep going at it――

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hey, did you hear? There's a festival nearby tonight!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Really? Let's go together after we're done with training then!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh, a festival…? They're engaging in 
quite the refined activity, aren't they?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I remember being taken there when I was a little. I remember 
there were lots of stalls, and it was lively and bustling.
choice_data_list: Want to go check it out?
Want to go check it out?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah… are you sure?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In that case, we should hurry up and wrap up training. 
I'll give it my all and do one more session.

After finishing up training around sunset, Mejiro Mcqueen 
and I made our way to the festival venue.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: My, this is quite a large, bustling crowd, isn't it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
There are so many stalls that it's hard to decide where 
to start looking. What should we try out first? Oh!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That stall out further in the back… 
could we have a quick look at it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. Well then, let's check it out.

I started walking quickly to catch up with 
Mejiro McQueen. However, at that moment—
I unfortunately bumped into someone.

If it continues like this, I'm going to lose sight 
of Mejiro Mcqueen. But it was already too late.

For a while now, I've been searching for 
Mejiro Mcqueen with no luck.
(Ding dong, ding dong♪）

text_block_list.name: Announcer A
text_block_list.text:
Lost and found announcement. Can the trainer of 
Mejiro McQueen please come to the committee 
tent immediately, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah…… Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, it's because I went ahead without waiting…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This time, I will make sure not to get carried 
away and stay with you, Trainer……
choice_data_list: It's not a big deal, so don't worry about it.
It's not a big deal, so don't worry about it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But, I don't want to cause you trouble――
choice_data_list: It's a festival rule to let loose and have fun.
It's a festival rule to let loose and have fun.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh? Festival rule…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Haha, you're certainly right about that. After all, everyone 
who comes here is enjoying themselves without restraint.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, then I have a small favor to ask. 
This is the stall I was going to go to earlier―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If it's all right with you, will you come with me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If I can catch one right… there!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ah, the string broke…… 
Excuse me, I would like another try please!
It turns out that the stall that caught Mejiro Mcqueen's interest was a Yo-yo Tsuri stall.
And then, a short time later―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I did it, Trainer!
I looked over and saw that Mejiro Mcqueen had successfully reeled in a Yo-yo balloon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Huhu, it was quite a challenge, but it feels so 
rewarding when you manage to catch one.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm feeling good about winning the next game. 
So, which stall should we go to next?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
――Ah, look over here! That looks like a shooting game! 
And what's more, it says that you can win luxury prizes!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I wonder what kind of prizes those are. 
Well, since we're already here, shall we give it a go?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Come on, Trainer, over here!

After thoroughly enjoying the festival, we decided 
to walk back to the training facility together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for coming along with me today. 
Thanks to you, I had a really great time.
choice_data_list: I didn't do anything in particular.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That is not true. It's just, how can I put it into words…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If you hadn't been here with me as my Trainer, I probably 
wouldn't have let loose and had as much fun like this.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Until now, as a horsegirl of the Mejiro family, I have always 
striven to maintain proper conduct at all times. But――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If it's for you, Trainer… I'd be willing 
to break that rule, just a little bit.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: After all, you'll forgive me, won't you, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
…… Thank you so much! Now, I want to 
propose an idea right away―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That carrot castella we bought at the festival… 
shall we eat that while walking together?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I usually would never eat while walking, but 
since it's just the two of us here right now…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Haha, thank you very much. 
Well then, Trainer, please help yourself.
